opensoul.org

Blogging from TextMate

June 21, 2006

Amazingly, this blog post was created using the latest version of TextMate. It has an incredible new bundle that uses the MetaWeblog API for for blogging to Drupal, Moveable Type, Type, Wordpress, and more. Maybe now I’ll blog more since it’s so easy (yeah, right).

update: unfortunately wordpress doesn’t understand Textile. I’ll have to fix that.
